name: setId
shortDescription: Changes the ID of a peer
description: This method changes the ID of a peer. This can be used for example to replace a device. The new ID has to be unused in order for this method to work.

parameters.name: currentPeerId
parameters.description: The current ID of the peer

parameters.name: newPeerId
parameters.description: The new ID of the peer

errors.description: Current or new peer ID are invalid.
New peer ID is already in use.
